name: cloud blanket worsted version
notes:
you will receive a pdf file with step-by-step instructions on how to make the cloud blanket, the worsted-weight version. this pattern also includes a crochet diagram.

size: 13 sizes available from lovey up to king size.
skill level: beginner
the pattern uses standard american terms
yarn: wool-ease by lion brand yarn  and mandala ombré by lion brand yarn 

i would love to see your finished products
tag me on instagram @cj.dsgn and use the hashtag #cloudblanket

refund
there are no refunds on patterns

resell finished product with pattern credit
